actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporation on securities.

summary.text: Small Investors Act - Excludes, under the Internal Revenue Code, the first $1,000 of long-term capital gain realized by taxpayers other than corporations on the sale or exchange of securities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporation on securities.
